channel.title: Clienthandler keeps rejecting people
channel.description:
Heya,
i've been having a problem when i try to login. it usually works the first time but then if anyone logs out of the server and trys to log back in i get: [code]Clienthandler: accepted from ################################# Clienthandler: rejected from #################################[/code]
i also get the "no response from server" buisness. i hope its not the server because i like it how it is and i HATE kzar servers. I have done so much as i have added silab items to it twice because they changed after the first time -.-
its really irritating!

item.title: Clienthandler keeps rejecting people
item.dc:creator: @yazoomafroo yazoomafroo
item.description:
@yazoomafroo wrote:

Heya,

i’ve been having a problem when i try to login. it usually works the first time but then if anyone logs out of the server and trys to log back in i get:

Clienthandler: accepted from ################################# Clienthandler: rejected from #################################

i also get the “no response from server” buisness.
i hope its not the server because i like it how it is and i HATE kzar servers. I have done so much as i have added silab items to it twice because they changed after the first time -.-

its really irritating!
